metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13166 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the kernel v4l2 video driver.Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID A-34624167.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-128-generic - 4.4.0-128.154~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-128-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-128.154~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-128-lowlatency - 4.4.0-128.154~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-128-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-128.154~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-128-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-128.154~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-128-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-128.154~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-128-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-128.154~14.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-128-generic - 4.4.0-128.154~14.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1023-aws - 4.4.0-1023.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-lts-utopic: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-vivid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
linux-lts-wily: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-128.154~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1023.23').
linux-azure package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1').
